column5: Solar panel installer SolarCity Corp   which is in the process of being bought by Tesla Motors Inc   named Radford Small chief financial officer  replacing Tanguy Serra.
Sept 28 Solar panel installer SolarCity Corp   which is in the process of being bought by Tesla Motors Inc  named Radford Small chief financial officer  replacing Tanguy Serra.
